text: UK-DMC 3 is a constellation of three British Earth-imaging satellites which are operated by DMC International Imaging. They were constructed by Surrey Satellite Technology and launched by ISRO on 10 July 2015.http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/science/isro-successfully- launches-pslv-c28-carrying-5-uk-satellites/articleshow/48024638.cms ==Cost== Beijing based Twenty-First Century Aerospace Technology Company Limited (21AT) agreed for 110 million British pounds ($170.2 million) to cover the entire cost of the three satellites delivery in orbit.http://spacenews.com/surrey- build-three-optical-imaging-satellites-chinese-firm/ ==See also== *UK-DMC 2 *2015 in spaceflight == References == ==External links== *UK-DMC3 Mission pages from manufacturer SSTL Category:Spacecraft launched in 2015 Category:Satellites of the United Kingdom Category:Spacecraft launched by PSLV rockets Category:2015 in the United Kingdom
title: UK-DMC 3
